Package coldbox.system.testing

Class Summary
BaseHandlerTest A base test for unit testing event handlers
BaseInterceptorTest A base test for testing interceptors
BaseModelTest A base test for testing model objects
BasePluginTest A base test for testing plugins
BaseTestCase A base test case for doing ColdBox Testing based on the MXUnit Framework
MockBox A unit testing mocking/stubing factory for ColdFusion 7 and above and any CFML Engine
